text:
Dennis Lynn Heck (born July 29, 1952) is an American politician. He is the U.S. Representative for Washington's 10th congressional district since 2013. He is also the Lieutenant Governor-elect of Washington. He is a member of the Democratic Party
On December 4, 2019, Heck announced that he would not seek reelection in 2020. On April 3, 2020 he announced his plans to run for lieutenant governor. He won the general election in November.
